section.title: Restrictions
section.para: Extended object suppliers do not have access to the IEclipseContext in which they are called. This limits them to search for objects independent of the current Eclipse context. But general Dependency Injection can be used inside an ExtendedObjectSupplier implementation, so that services like the IEventBroker, EModelService and so on can be injected.
For example preferences are implemented as extended object suppliers . They look for the preference values on the file system and do not know about the IEclipseContext .
